mapper.select: select t.coin as "chargedCoin", t.paid_amount as "paidAmount", t.coin_balance as "coinBalance", to_char(t.created_at, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as "chargedAt" from ( select ch.coin, ch.at_that_price as paid_amount, ch.created_at, sum(ch.coin) over ( partition by ch.user_id order by ch.created_at asc, ch.coin_history_id asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row ) as coin_balance, ch.coin_history_id from coin_history ch where ch.user_id = #{userId} ) t order by t.created_at desc, t.coin_history_id desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{limit} rows only
